title: Spider venom drug enters clinical trial
description: Aussie researchers have developed a promising treatment for heart attack and stroke using a molecule derived from funnel-web spider venom. Though currently entered in clinical trials, the success of the drug could change the future of emergency care. #funnelwebspider #spidervenom #emergencycare #clinicaltrial
